scripts.tools:clean-node-modules: find node_modules/@matter -type f \( -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' -o -name '*.ts' \) -delete; find node_modules/@matter -type d \( -name 'src' -o -name 'cjs' \) -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.standalone: bash -c 'while true; do node --max-old-space-size=128 standalone.mjs; code=$?; if [ $code -ne 42 ]; then exit $code; fi; done'
